ComicInfo.Summary:
If you're a fan of Mirak Andolfo's MERCY try Un/Sacred!
The extrodinary talent of Mirka Andolfo (Unnatural, DC Bombshells, Mercy) brings to life a Heaven (and a Hell) filled with humor and lovable characters!
The lovely new couple will soon be new parents! So it's now time for the whole family to come together and support them. But of course, when it comes to family, especially when there's devils and angels involved, nothing ever goes quite as planned...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mirka Andolfo | 1 | B | Cover B (Angelina & Damiano In Love) | Mirka Andolfo | 2 | C | Cover C (Damiano & Angelina w/Mom) | Mirka Andolfo | 3 | D | Cover D (Pencil Sketch w/Damiano, Angelina & Child) | Mirka Andolfo | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Virgin Variant Cover | Mirka Andolfo | 5 |
